title: Unveiling the reactivity of CO2 with carbanions: a theoretical analysis of the carboxylation step
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01065E, Paper

Catia Nicoletti, Manuel Orlandi, Luca Dell'Amico, Andrea Sartorel
Synthetic insertion of carbon dioxide into organic scaffolds typically requires the reaction of CO2 with a carbanion (carboxylation step), with this latter being generated through chemical, electrochemical, or photochemical routes....
